action_bar_actions._description: The label for the actions dropdown on the action button bar

alert_close._description: Screen reader text for the close button on alerts

autonumeric_abbr_billions._description: The suffix to show after an abbreviated value in the billions (e.g. $1.2b)

autonumeric_abbr_millions._description: The suffix to show after an abbreviated value in the millions (e.g. $1.2m)

autonumeric_abbr_thousands._description: The suffix to show after an abbreviated value in the thousands (e.g. $1.2k)

avatar_error_not_image_description._description: Message description displayed when the user attempts to upload an avatar file that is not a valid image

avatar_error_not_image_title._description: Message title displayed when the user attempts to upload an avatar file that is not a valid image

avatar_error_too_large_description._description: Message description displayed when the user attempts to upload an avatar image with a file size that is too large

avatar_error_too_large_title._description: Message title displayed when the user attempts to upload an avatar image with a file size that is too large

carousel_button_label_next._description: The accessibility label for the carousel next button

carousel_button_label_previous._description: The accessibility label for the carousel previous button

carousel_dot_label._description: The label for the carousel navigation dots

checklist_select_all._description: Text for the link in a checklist to select all items.

checklist_clear_all._description: Text for the link in a checklist to clear selections.

checklist_only_selected_items._description: Text for the checkbox in a checklist that toggles only showing selected items.

checklist_no_items._description: Text in a checklist when no items are shown based on the current filter.

checklist_check_title._description: Title for the empty header in the checkbox column for the checklist

checklist_search_label._description: Label for the checklist search box

checklist_categories_label._description: Label for the checklist categories dropdown

chevron_collapse._description: Screen reader text for when clicking the chevron would collapse the corresponding section

chevron_expand._description: Screen reader text for when clicking the chevron would expand the corresponding section

context_menu_default_label._description: The label on the context menu button used for screen readers when the consumer has not specified a label

definition_list_none_found._description: The default text to show when a definition list item has no value

grid_back_to_top._description: Text for link in grid to scroll back to the top.

grid_column_picker_all_categories._description: Text for category filters used to indicate that all columns should be shown in the column picker

grid_column_picker_description_header._description: In the column picker, the header for the column showing the description of the columns to include in the grid.

grid_column_picker_header._description: Header text for the grid column picker screen
grid_column_picker_header.message: Scegliere le colonne da mostrare nell’elenco

grid_column_picker_name_header._description: In the column picker, the header for the column showing the names of the columns to include in the grid.

grid_column_picker_search_placeholder._description: Search text placeholder for the search box on the grid column picker

grid_column_picker_submit._description: Button text for applying changes made in the grid column picker

grid_columns_button._description: Label for button to select columns to display in a grid.

grid_filters_apply._description: Text for button on filters flyout to apply the selected filters to the grid

grid_filters_button._description: Label for button to select filters to be applied to a grid.

grid_filters_clear._description: Text for button on filters flyout to clear the selected filters for the grid

grid_filters_header._description: Header text for grid filters flyout

grid_filters_hide._description: Hide link text for grid filters flyout

grid_filters_summary_header._description: Header text for filter summary on top of grid

grid_load_more._description: The text for the button to load additional rows into the grid if more rows are available.

grid_search_placeholder._description: Placeholder text in grid search box

grid_column_picker_search_no_columns._description: Displays when no columns are found for the specified search text.

infinite_scroll_load_more._description: Text for loading more in the infinite scroll button

modal_footer_cancel_button._description: Default lable text for modal cancel button

modal_footer_primary_button._description: Default lable text for modal primary button

page_noaccess_button.message: Torna a una pagina non classificata

page_noaccess_description.message:
Spiacenti, non si possiedono i diritti per questa pagina.
Se si pensa di possedere i diritti, contattare l’amministratore del sistema.

page_noaccess_header.message: Procedere, qui non c’è nulla da vedere

text_expand_close_text._description: Text for the close button on the text expand modal

grid_action_bar_clear_selection._description: Clear the selections in the grid.

grid_action_bar_cancel_mobile_actions._description: Close the menu where you choose an action in mobile multiselect.

grid_action_bar_choose_action._description: Open a menu to choose an action in mobile  multiselect.

date_field_invalid_date_message._description: error message shown when an invalid date is entered.

date_range_picker_min_date_error._description: error message for date range picker
date_range_picker_min_date_error.message: La data finale deve essere posteriore alla data iniziale

date_range_picker_max_date_error._description: error message for date range picker
date_range_picker_max_date_error.message: La data iniziale deve essere anteriore alla data finale

errormodal_ok._description: Text used on the primary button to dismiss the error modal.

error_description_broken._description: Text used for the error description to when page is broken.
error_description_broken.message: Provare ad aggiornare la pagina o riprovare più tardi.

error_description_construction._description: Text used for the error description when page is under construction.
error_description_construction.message:
Stiamo apportando dei miglioramenti!
Ritornare fra un po’ di tempo.

error_title_broken._description: Text used for the error title when something is broken

error_title_construction._description: Text used for the error title when page is under construction.

error_title_notfound._description: Text used for the error title when page is not found.

file_upload_drag_or_click.message: Trascina qui il file o fai clic per sfogliare

file_upload_invalid_file.message: Questo tipo di file non è valido

file_upload_paste_link.message: Incolla un link in un file

file_upload_link_input._description: Label for input to upload file
file_upload_link_input.message: Aggiungi un link a un file

file_item_delete._description: Label for button that deletes a file

listbuilder_footer_back_to_top._description: Text for scrolling back to the top of the listbuilder

listbuilder_add_title._description: Text for the add button title

listbuilder_card_switcher._description: Text for the card view switcher

search_placeholder._description: Placeholder text for search input component

searchfield_searching._description: text for ui-select search control while performing a remote search

searchfield_no_records._description: text for ui-select search control when no records are found.
searchfield_no_records.message: Non è stato trovato nessun record corrispondente

selectfield_summary_text._description: Text displayed when the user has more than 5 items selected

selectfield_remove._description: Text for screen readers to convey the meaning of the remove icon button on select field values

selectfieldpicker_select._description: Text displayed on the primary dialog button to confirm selection of multiple items

selectfieldpicker_select_value._description: The default header text for the select field picker directive when the user is allowed to select one value (singular)

selectfieldpicker_select_values._description: The default header text for the select field picker directive when the user is allowed to select more than one value (plural)

selectfieldpicker_clear._description: Text displayed on the button in single select mode to clear selection and close form

tile_chevron_label._description: Label for the expand and collapse chevron in tiles

wizard_navigator_finish._description: Text displayed on the next button when a wizard is ready for completion.

wizard_navigator_next._description: Text displayed on a wizard's next button.

wizard_navigator_previous._description: Text displayed on a wizard's previous button.

datepicker_today._description: Text displayed in the Today button of the datepicker

datepicker_clear._description: Text displayed in the Clear button of the datepicker

datepicker_close._description: Text displayed in the Close button of the datepicker

datepicker_open._description: Text for the datepicker open button

reorder_top._description: Text displayed to indicate that a row can be pushed to the top of the list

tab_add._description: Screen reader text for the add button on a tabset

tab_open._description: Screen reader text for the open button on a tabset

filter_modal_apply._description: Text for button to apply filters

filter_modal_clear._description: Text for button to clear filters

filter_button_title._description: Text for the filter button title

filter_summary_header._description: Text for the filter summary component

filter_summary_close._description: Text for the label for the filter summary close icon

sort_menu_heading._description: Text for the heading in the sort dropdown

pagination_previous._description: Text for the label for the pagination previous link

pagination_next._description: Text for the label for the pagination next link
